content.rendered:
RHINO4X4 EVOLUTION 3D FRONT REPLACEMENT WINCH BAR SUITABLE FOR THE TOYOTA HILUX* 2018+ 

This is the start of our new Evolution 3D range of bars and its even better than our last! These new bars give your vehicle an aggressive 4wd look without looking like a truck. They are a tough 3 and 5mm all steel construction and protect all of your engine vitals. They also give you full winch compatibility, 2 rated recovery points, market leading angle of approach, and a heavy duty bash plate all as standard.

-The Evolution Bumper is finished in a hard-wearing flat black Powder coat or can be colour coded as an option. All our parts are now zinc plated before powder coating to ensure a long rust free life. They are a 3mm and 6mm steel construction and includes as standard a 5mm Aluminium bash plate not offered on other brands. The middle winch plate insert comes standard in Black or can be optioned as stainless steel or colour coded with the rest of the bar. We also offer as standard, LED foglights which are an extra on many other brands.

-The Evolution bumper has carried out many dynamic crash tests here in Australia to ensure it complements the existing safety systems for example Air bags. The Standard bumper on your vehicle gets removed completely and can be saved / sold.

– Our bar suits the wide body Hilux or narrow body with aftermarket flares.

Includes: The below are included items that are charged as extra on other brands

Winch mount (no additional brackets required)

Integrated LED Fog lights

5mm Aluminium Bash / Protection plate (Not just a thin short stone shield)

2 x Vehicle recovery points

Hinged number plate bracket to access winch area / Fairlead

Optional:

Can be colour coded to your vehicle specification

Middle winch plate insert can be optioned as stainless steel

Shackles

Winch

Spotlight bar

Spotlights

excerpt.rendered:
RHINO BAR SUIT FOR HILUX 2018 – 2020

Please note: Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order.
